name: Angles Game
description:
=== Known issues ===
  • You can sometimes get stuck inside walls. Press 'R' to restart level
=== Controls ===Arrow keys: Hold to aimC: Press while aiming to dash in directionR: Restart levelThis is more of a prototype to show of some mechanics, than a fully functional game. There are only a handful of levels and the "game" can be completed in a minute or two...
